version_description: Bug fixes.
Bug fixed and performance improvements.

Added Facebook Messenger support!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Added Facebook Messenger support!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- ATOMIC EXPLOSION MOVIE FX! Nuclear Blast, Bombing Run, Missile Silo, Sticky Bombs and more!
- Apple Watch Director's Assistant! For the first time ever, direct and STAR in your own movies!
- MEGA FX PACK – a new, super-bundle sale of *20* blockbuster FX offered for a limited time!
- Instagram Share
- Bug fixes

- ATOMIC EXPLOSION MOVIE FX! Nuclear Blast, Bombing Run, Missile Silo, Sticky Bombs and more!

STAR WARS update includes: exclusive access to 7 FX made by the same VFX and sound design teams who made the feature films!
- 3 FX from the original trilogy: Vader’s Revenge, Lightsaber Fight and AT-AT Smash
- 4 FX from the new film, Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Falcon Battle, BB-8 Spark, BB-8 Escape and BB-8 Surprise
- FREE Star Wars FX: BB-8 Spark
- Bad Robot will donate 100% of the sales price of Star Wars FX packs to the U.S. Fund for UNICEF to support UNICEF Kid Power (from Nov. 5, 2015 to May 5, 2016)
- GIFs! For the first time ever, easily share your blockbusters as GIFs!
- MEGA FX BUNDLE SUPER SPECIAL: 20 FX for $3.99!
- Share with Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Messenger or Email!
- Optional High Resolution Video Saving
- Use Apple Watch with Action Movie FX to direct and STAR in your own films!
- Bug fixes
